Name: New Grass Farms
Description: Visit Shaded Grove Farm Market and see firsthand how the food you are feeding your family is being raised. We offer an on-farm store where you can shop our grass-fed beef, lamb, pasture-raised pork, chicken and eggs as well as pecans, coffee, and more.
